Name: Order Translations

Description: Example how to check translations status for a resource file

Name: Authentication Tokens
Description: Either specify email and password on object construct or retrieve a token, save it somewhere safe and use SetToken()-method to set the token. Latter method is recommended if your code constantly creates new instances of backend client.
